summary: The crypto lender is only the second firm to disclose such a large GBTC stake, after Three Arrows Capital.
title: BlockFi Takes 5% Stake in Grayscale’s $4.8B Bitcoin Trust
content: Crypto lender BlockFi has become one of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust’s (GBTC) biggest whales.
Read more: BlockFi Raises $50M From Universities, NBA Star, Others as Crypto Lending Soars
